review: This home Stay located at kanatal.main city. This is situated at road side of Chamba Mussorie Highway . This is and good property with excellent view of Hills. There are different types of room. Rooms are very spacious and attached bath and with wide terrace / balcony. This is three storied building nest and clean. Hotel also have Nice Restaurant and dining room . you can also use their kitchen. Property have own Parking area also. All staff are well behaved and helpful. But we have faced some problem of water supply in washroom otherwise the stay was ok. Contact Number of this property is +911376283060.
name: CHANDAN SINHA
